scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Presentation of Christ in the Temple. The Virgin Mary, dressed in a blue robe adorned with gold, presents the Christ Child to a bishop who is seated. The bishop, wearing a mitre and ceremonial robes, is reaching out to receive the child. Behind the Virgin Mary stands a bearded man, possibly Joseph, holding a candle. To the left, an angel with white wings and a golden halo is depicted above a blue, wavy sea-like element, holding a scroll. Another angel, also with a halo and wings, is positioned lower left, also holding a scroll. The architectural setting is an interior with a vaulted ceiling decorated with blue and gold patterns, supported by columns. The scene is framed by an arch.
